DOC.brief_summary: The investigator investigate effect glucosamine ibuprofen combine 12 week muscle strength-training patient knee-osteoarthritis . The investigator would like elucidate whether treatment glucosamine NSAID interact effect exercise osteoarthritis patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Glucosamine Ibuprofen Combined With Physical Training Patients With Knee-Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Age 50 70 year Bilateral tibiofemoral osteoarthritis knee xray American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) clinical classification criterion Severe health problem cardiovascular disease , active cancer , diabetes , kidney liver disease Excess alcohol use ( > 21 alcoholic drink per week ) Severe overweight ( BMI > 35 ) History injury operation knee , plan kneejoint replacement , rheumatologic disease , previous gastric ulcer , allergy content ibuprofen glucosamine , regular strength training prior inclusion
